thread.section_title: Gamesdeal.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gamesdeal.com | www.gamesdeal.com
thread.title: Ben Coombes

author: Ben Coombes
title: Ben Coombes
text: I paid for 3 different game codes via Paypal in one transaction, the money was taken instantly. However I didn't receive any communication from Gamesdeal, not even an order confirmation. I have sent two emails, one via PayPal and one via the customer service option on their website but still nothing. I am sure my funds will be replaced as I paid through PayPal but I would advise you to use caution when dealing with this company from my recent experience.
